name: Honest Space Penguins
description:
Help four penguins do their best to manage their spaceship, but everything feels like it's going out of control ! Each penguin has their own responsibilities, and one penguin has found himself distracted by a visual novel... Will you be able to stay alive long enough to discover the true ending to the story ?

Controls:
Penguin 1: Move your mouse to block the incoming asteroids!
Penguin 2: Use the WASD keys to manage the penguin robot. Dodge the asteroids and put out the fires on the ship!
Penguin 3: Fill in the puzzle to fix penguin robots!
Penguin 4: Choose the option for the visual novel that you feel most strongly towards!
